summary: kept changes somewhat subtle, but enough to make the home more desirable and comfy
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b]DEXTER'S COZIER BREEZEHOME - NOT HEARTHFIRE COMPATIBLE[/b][/size][/center]features:

[list]
[*]made with people that run skyrim on a potato in mind
[*]all objects are static, other than books in alchemy lab and bedroom
[*]better everything basically (well, compared to vanilla)
[*]some hints towards the thieves guild, companions, and dark brotherhood factions
[*]a few more storage places (most named storage!)
[*]now with a fancy enchanting font, some clutter, and a bedroom upgrade
[*]warmer lighting, but its kind of dark now (candlelit)
[*]cleaned with TES5Edit
[/list]
PLEASE READ SECTION/UPDATES:

[list]
[*]if you want to modify it for personal use or to upload modifications or whatever, feel free to! no need to ask or anything
[*]if you do use with hearthfire lighting wont match & your computer might explode (er, skyrim will just crash lol)
[*][s]breezehome is NOT correctly navmeshed, since i have no idea what im doing[/s] now correctly navmeshed thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/7776834/]gmus[/url]!
[*]final version released
[/list]
author: Dexter Lynette
